Created by master perfumers Dominique Ropion and Ilias Ermenidis, Girl Of Now Forever was launched in 2021 as a continuation of Elie Saab's beloved Girl of Now line. The Lebanese fashion designer's vision translates perfectly into this fragrance, combining Middle Eastern opulence with Western refinement. The signature orange blossom and almond notes that define the Girl of Now collection are enhanced with juicy blackcurrant and sweet pear for a more vibrant opening, while the base notes of cashmeran, patchouli, and vanilla create a warm, sensual foundation that lingers beautifully on the skin. üî•

This new arrival fragrance embodies the spirit of a confident, sophisticated woman who leaves an unforgettable impression wherever she goes. The exquisite bottle design features the iconic flower-shaped cap that has become synonymous with the Girl of Now collection, making it a stunning addition to any vanity table.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Girl Of Now Forever EDP last on skin?
Girl Of Now Forever EDP offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on the skin. The rich concentration of oriental notes combined with the powerful base of cashmeran, patchouli, and vanilla creates a fragrance that evolves beautifully throughout the day while maintaining its distinctive character. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and layer with matching body products from the collection. ‚ú®
